Package slogo.compiler

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    SLogoRunnable
    An interface that marks an object as runnable and expects 0 or more parameters.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Compiler
    Parses user input to check if it is valid Slogo syntax.
    Parser
    The Parser class takes user inputs and converts them into SLogoToken objects of the correct type.
    SLogoComment  
    SLogoConstant  
    SLogoFunction
    A Function is a Token than extends SLogoRunnable and WorkspaceEntry.
    SLogoToken
    Superclass of all possible tokens recognized by the Parser: Command, Variable, Constant, List, and Comment.
    SLogoTokenList  
    SLogoTokenMaker
    The SLogoTokenMaker class creates SLogoToken objects of the correct type given a user input.
    SLogoUserDefinedFunction  
    SLogoVariable  
    Workspace
    Keeps track of all objects that extend WorkspaceEntry.
    WorkspaceEntry
    This interface makes an object an addable object in a workspace.
